mapper.select: select c.name, a.title, a.author, a.view_count, a.post_date, a.edit_date,a.id from article a join category c on a.category_id = c.id
mapper.insert: insert into article (category_id,title, author, password, content) values (#{categoryId}, #{title}, #{author}, #{password}, #{content})
insert into file(article_id, uuid_name, original_name, dir) values (#{articleId}, #{uuidName}, #{originalName}, #{dir})
